text: Ghost Town is a 2008 American fantasy comedy movie directed by David Koepp and starring Ricky Gervais, Greg Kinnear, TÃ©a Leoni, Aasif Mandvi, Billy Campbell, Kristen Wiig, Aaron Tveit.
